vps_dashboard_migrate_confirm_descriptio: Please note that during the migration process, your VPS will no longer be accessible.
vps_dashboard_migrate_confirm_warning_me: Warning: This action cannot be undone. By clicking “Start migration”, your VPS will be automatically migrated.
vps_dashboard_migrate_confirm_label_text: Please enter the word ‘MIGRATE’ to confirm your choice
vps_dashboard_migrate_confirm_success: Your request has been processed. Your VPS migration is in progress. You will be sent an email once your service is up and running again.
vps_dashboard_migrate_confirm_error: An error has occurred migrating your VPS:
